response.headline: Sanchon Korean temple food restaurant in Seoul with vegan-friendly traditional dishes
response.summary: Sanchon is a Korean restaurant in Insa-dong, Seoul serving traditional temple food. The restaurant features seven wild herbs and vegetables, has a 4.1-star rating with 660 reviews, and offers vegan-friendly options in the ₩20,000-30,000 price range.

extracted_text: Part 6 | Vegan Friendly Temple Food Restaurant in Seoul
image_details.key_interest: Traditional Korean temple food restaurant serving vegan-friendly dishes
